writings.text: 板垣死すとも自由は死せず

readings.text: いたがきしすともじゆうはしせず

furigana.writing: 板垣死すとも自由は死せず
furigana.reading: いたがきしすともじゆうはしせず

meanings.info: allegedly uttered by Itagaki Taisuke, founder of the Meiji-era Liberal Party, after a failed assassination attempt
glossary: Itagaki may die, but liberty never!
